title: Whale 🐋
description: A whale is defined as a person or organization that owns a large amount of a particular cryptocurrency.

props.body: A whale is defined as a person or organization that owns a large amount of a particular cryptocurrency. The quantity of cryptocurrency owned by whales is usually enough to affect the market, giving them the ability to manipulate prices. Crypto whales are named after the sea mammal due to their huge size in comparison to other sea creatures, such as fish.
